movie-description: A feature-length documentary, possibly focusing, at least in part, on the recent anti-globalisation protests in Gothenburg, Sweden and the alleged police misconduct during the protests. The first film to be made by the appeal group 'Swedish Film Workers for Peace and Freedom in an Independent Palestine'.
movie-short-description: Directed by Stefan Jarl, Lukas Moodysson.  With Stefan Jarl, Lukas Moodysson. A feature-length documentary, possibly focusing, at least in part, on the recent anti-globalisation protests in Gothenburg, Sweden and the alleged police misconduct during the protests. The first film to be made by the appeal group 'Swedish Film Workers for Peace and Freedom in an Independent Palestine'.
